resources.string: Hyperlink to the CMPT 276 home page: CMPT 276 HOME PAGE

HOW TO PLAY: Enemy fighters are hiding! And the resistance needs your help to find them! The board has a certain number of fighters underneath, that you may try to find by clicking on the tiles. If there isn\'t a fighter underneath it will reveal how many fighters are in that row and column. If there is a fighter underneath, it will reveal the fighter. Find all the fighters with the last amount of taps possible to win. May the force be with you!
